SX0020/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDDF/FRANKFURT/MAIN CONSTRUCTION OF A PHOTOVOLTAIC SYSTEM NEAR RWY 18 VALIDITY: 16MAY24-MAR25 THE SYSTEM WILL BE LOCATED AT A DIST OF AT LEAST 85 M TO THE W OF THE RWY AND S OF TWY S. TO THE E OF THE RWY END, THERE WILL ALSO BE AN INSTL WITH A LATERAL DIST OF AT LEAST 85 M FM THE RWY. THE SYSTEM WILL HAVE A MAX HGT OF 3M ABV GND.

SX0013/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDDF/FRA/FRANKFURT/MAIN VALIDITY: 21MAR24 - 30APR25 INSTALLATION OF A RIAS AT FRANKFURT MAIN AIRPORT TO INCREASE SAFETY WHEN XNG RWY 07C/25C, A RWY INCURSION ALERTING SYSTEM (RIAS) HAS BEEN INSTL ON TWYS M6 AND M30 IN ADDN TO THE EXISTING CAT II/III HLDG PSN INCLUDING STOP BAR. THIS SYSTEM IS ACT EVEN BY THE SLIGHTEST XNG OF THE ACT STOP BAR AND ALERTS THE PILOT. FST, THE ACFT APPROACHING THE CAT II/III HLDG PSN IS DETECTED BY A MICROWAVE SENSOR SYSTEM. IN CASE OF AN UNAUTHORISED XNG OF THE ACT STOP BAR, FOUR VERY BRIGHT, FLG RED SFC LGT AT THE CAT I HLDG PSN AS WELL AS TWO RED LGT EACH ON BOTH SHOULDERS OF TWY BTN THE CAT I AND CAT II/III HLDG PSN ARE ACT. THE LGT IS DIRECTED TOWARDS THE PILOT AND THUS ALERTS THE PILOT OF AN IMMINENT RWY INCURSION. IN ADDN, THE ATC TWR CONTROLLERS ARE ALERTED

SX0012/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDDF/FRA/FRANKFURT/MAIN VALIDITY: 01APR24 - 30NOV24 TEMPO OPN OF ACFT STANDS J5, J7, J9 AND J11 AS WELL AS TWY S13. SX0021/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDDS/STUTTGART VALIDITY: 03JUN24 - 20SEP24 THE CONCRETE SURFACE OF TWY N BTN TWY A AND TWY B WILL BE REPLACED. DURING THE CONSTRUCTION WORK, THE FOLLOWING RESTRICTIONS AND CHANGES WILL APPLY: - TWY N WILL BE CLSD BTN TWY A AND TWY D. IN ADDITION, TWY A AND TWY B WILL BE CLSD BTN TWY N AND TWY S. - THE BYPASS AREAS P1 AND P2 WILL BE CLSD. - IN THE SECTION OF TWY S ADJACENT TO THE CONSTRUCTION SITE, TAXIING IS RESTRICTED TO ACFT UP TO A MAXIMUM WINGSPAN OF 76 M. - UNUSABLE PORTIONS OF TAXIWAYS WILL EITHER HAVE THEIR NORMAL MARKINGS REMOVED OR WILL BE MARKED ACCORDINGLY. - THE ENTIRE CONSTRUCTION AREA WILL BE MARKED/LIGHTED DURING THE DAY AND AT NIGHT. IN UNFAVOURABLE METEOROLOGICAL CONDITIONS (DRY AND WINDY), THE LARGE-SCALE CONSTRUCTION WORK MAY CAUSE VISIBLE ACCUMULATIONS OF DUST. THE AIRPORT OPERATOR WILL TAKE PREVENTIVE MEASURES TO KEEP THIS AT A MINIMUM. FURTHER OPERATIONAL RESTRICTIONS WILL BE PUBLISHED BY NOTAM.

AIRCRAFT WITH RADIO FAILURE MUST OPERATE AS FOLLOWS: DEPARTING AIRCRAFT CONTINUE STRICTLY ON THE ASSIGNED TAXI ROUTE TO THE CLEARENCE LIMIT AND WAIT FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND. ARRIVING AIRCRAFT - IF HAS ALREADY RECEIVED TAXIING INSTRUCTIONS, CONTINUES STRICTLY ON THE ASSIGNED TAXI ROUTE, TO THE CLEARENCE LIMIT AND WAIT FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND OR, IF HAS BEEN INSTRUCTED PROCEED TO THE PARKING STAND. - IF THE FAILURE OCCURS IN FLIGHT OR IN ANY CASE NO TAXIING INSTRUCTIONS HAVE BEEN RECEIVED: - IF IT RECEIVES SPECIFIC INSTRUCTIONS, VIA LIGHT SIGNALS, IT CLEARS THE LANDING AREA AND WAITS FOR THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND. - IF IT DOES NOT RECEIVE THESE INSTRUCTIONS VIA LIGHT SIGNALS (FOR EXAMPLE IN THE CASE OF REDUCED VISIBILITY) IT STOPS ON THE RUNWAY, AT THE FIRST AVAILABLE LINK, AND IN ANY CASE BASED ON ANY KNOWN RESTRICTIONS, WAITS FOR THE FOLLOW-ME VHEICLE IN ORDER TO BE GUIDED TO THE PARKING STAND. NOTE: THE INSTRUCTION TO CLEAR THE LANDING AREA, PROVIDED VIA LIGHT SIGNALS, DOES NOT IMPLY CONSTRAINTS ON THE ROUTE TO FOLLOW AND THEREFORE CAN ONLY BE USED WHEN COMPATIBLE WITH THE TRAFFIC SITUATION IN PROGRESS IN THE MANEUVERING AREA REF AIP AD 2 LIPK 1-13

WITH REFERENCE TO ITALIAN CIVIL AVIATION AUTHORITY (ENAC)PROVISION 4 JUN 2024, DUE TO REDUCED AVAILABILITY OF AIRCRAFT PARKING STANDS FOR NOT SCHEDULED FLIGHTS, THE MANAGEMENT OF DIVERTED FLIGHTS ON ARRIVAL WILL TAKE PLACE AS FOLLOWS: 1)IN ORDER TO SAFEGUARD THE AVAILABILITY OF PARKING STANDS FOR FLIGHTS REGULARLY SCHEDULED AT THE AIRPORT, THE DIVERTED FLIGHTS, AFTER LANDING, WILL BE PARKED ON THE APRON ONLY IN THE PRESENCE OF APPROPRIATE PARKING STANDS AVAILABLE FOR AT LEAST 2 HOURS (OR EVEN LONGER DEPENDING ON CURRENT OPERATIONAL SITUATION). IN THE ABSENCE OF SUCH TIPOLOGY OF AIRCRAFT STAND, DIVERTED FLIGHTS COULD BE SUBJECT TO LONG LASTING WAIT IN THE MOVEMENT AREA (EVEN A FEW HOURS), WITHOUT THE POSSIBILITY OF DISEMBARKING PASSENGERS, BAGS AND FREIGHT 2)THE CREW OF DIVERTED FLIGHTS PARKED IN THE MOVEMENT AREA ARE REQUESTED TO CONTACT HANDLER'S VHF FREQUENCY TO COMMUNICATE ANY REDUCTION IN EXPECTED ETD FROM THE AIRPORT, IN ORDER TO ALLOW THE AERODROME OPERATOR TO RE-EVALUATE THE AVAILABILITY OF AIRCRAFT STANDS ON THE APRON REF AIP AD 2 LIPE 1-23 ITEM 2.20 'LOCAL AERODROME REGULATIONS'

ADS-B DATA FOR ECRA (EUROPEAN CONNECTED REGIONAL AIRPORTS PROGRAMME) OPERATIONS. 1.1.IN ORDER TO COOPERATE WITH ADS-B RECEIVER USED BY AIRPORT OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL FOR USE OF THE ECRA PROGRAMME AT EINDHOVEN AIRPORT,PILOTS OF MODE S EQUIPPED ACFT WITH ADS-B FUNCTIONALITIES WHEN OPERATING ON THE GROUND SHALL: A)SELECT AUTO MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE OR B)IF AUTOMODE IS NOT AVAILABLE, SELECT ON (E.G.XPDR) AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE. -FROM THE REQUEST FOR TOWER PUSH-BACK OR TAXI,WHICHEVER IS EARLIER -AFTER LANDING,CONTINUOUSLY UNTIL THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED IN ITS STAND. -WHEN THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED, FLT CREW SHALL SELECT STBY. 1.1.2.WHENEVER THE ACFT IS CAPABLE OF REPORTING ACFT IDENTIFICATION (I.E.CALLSIGN USED IN FLT), THIS SHOULD BE ENTERED (THROUGH THE FMS OR THE TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL) AT THE TIME OF THE REQUEST FOR TOWED PUSH-BACK OR TAXI, WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. 1.1.3.AIR CREW MUST USE THE ICAO DEFINED FORMAT TO ENTER THE ACFT IDENTIFICATION. 1.1.4.TO ENSURE THAT THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED ON SSR FREQ (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS) IS NOT COMPROMISED, TCAS SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP, AND SHOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RWY.

FOR FLIGHTS DEPARTING FROM FRENCH AIRFIELDS, LOGON MUST BE INITIATED NO LATER THAN CROSSING FL150. Paragraph.Text: SX0060/22 AIP SUPPLEMENT EBBU/FIR - RESTRICTIONS RELATED TO THE RUSSIAN INVASION OF UKRAINE - 08SEP22-UFN 1 AVOIDANCE OF OPERATIONS IN THE CRISIS AREA BELGIAN AIR OPERATORS AND OWNERS OF AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN BELGIUM SHALL NOT ENTER UKBU, UKLV, UKBV, UKDV, UKFV, UKOV, URRV. FLIGHT OPERATIONS SHALL ALSO BE AVOIDED WITHIN THE BUFFER ZONE EXTENDING OUT TO 200 NM ALONG THE UKRAINE/RUSSIA BORDER. OPERATIONS WITHIN LUUU SHALL ONLY BE UNDERTAKEN IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE APPLICABLE AERONAUTICAL PUBLICATIONS ISSUED BY THE REPUBLIC OF MOLDOVA. ADDITIONAL RISK ASSESSMENT AND FLIGHT PLANNING DECISIONS SHALL BE TAKEN BEFORE OPERATING UUWV. 2 RESTRICTIONS FOR RUSSIAN OPERATORS LL RUSSIAN REGISTERED AIRCRAFT AND AIRCRAFT OWNED, CHARTERED OR OPERATED, OR OTHERWISE CONTROLLED BY NATURAL OR LEGAL PERSONS FROM THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION OR BY OPERATORS HOLDING AN AIR OPERATOR CERTIFICATE (AOC) ISSUED BY THE RUSSIAN FEDERATION AUTHORITIES ARE PROHIBITED TO ENTER, EXIT OR OVERFLY BELGIAN AND LUXEMBOURGISH AIRSPACE, EXCEPT FOR HUMANITARIAN, SAR AND LEASED AIRCRAFT ONE-WAY RETURN FLIGHTS WITH THE PERMISSION OF THE APPROPRIATE BELGIAN OR LUXEMBOURGISH AUTHORITIES AND IN CASE OF EMERGENCY LANDING OR EMERGENCY OVERFLIGHT.
